name: Rites of a Mailmare
description:
You are a Mailmare, delivering letters across the Lucidious archipelago. Using the art of Oneiromancy you can remove the obstacles that stand in your way.

This is a remake of my twine Rites of a Mailmare. It has been expanded with more content, a combat system that actually works, and even a soundtrack! 

The Rites of a Mailmare is an illustrated text adventure inspired by the randomized exploration of Rougelikes and the turn-based combat of classic RPGs.

The sea is a peculiar place, where strange animals roam and your mind might play tricks on you. Yet, it is also strangely peaceful as you sail just above the water in your tiny canoe, with only a radio and a pet Capricorn to keep you company.
